summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: UMICKOO Hair Straightener,Upgraded Flat Iron for Hair With Real-Time Temperature Display And Adjustable Temperature,1 Inch (Rose Gold) Review Date: 2019/09/16 Store: UMIKOO Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '14.48 x 4.61 x 2.32 inches; 1.79 Pounds', 'UPC': '692232543075'} Review Text: Let me start by saying that this straightener is very pretty. It is a lovely rose-gold color and has a sleek design. Included in the package was the straightener, a comb, two clips, a heat-resistant glove, and a storage pouch.

There is a digital temperature display that shows the current temperature, which is a really helpful feature. There is also a power button, up/down temperature control, and a barrel lock to keep the clamp closed.

I did find that this straightener heated up really quickly. It did not, however, straighten my hair very efficiently. I had to go over really small sections multiple times to achieve the desired results. That cannot be good for your hair and it took forever! My hair is very thick and on the coarse side so it may be much better suited to someone with finer hair. Overall, this is a definitely a decent straightener but it just didn’t work well for me.
*I received this product at no cost in exchange for a fair and unbiassed review. Review Title: Didn't work well for my hair Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 2-Pack Puretize 16.9 Oz Hand Sanitizing Gel w/Pump Tops - Extra Strength 70% Ethyl Alcohol - Moisturizing Formula with Aloe Vera, Vitamin E & Botanical Extracts - Quick Drying Formula Review Date: 2020/06/18 Store: Pure Daily Care Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Pure Daily Care', 'Unit Count': '33.8 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Special Feature': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 6.5 x 4.5 inches; 1.06 Pounds', 'UPC': '810016711360'} Review Text: This sanitizer is a great find! It did not dry my hands out or leave them feeling sticky. The package arrived quickly and both bottles were tightly wrapped. I have not been able to find sanitizer in stores and was so excited to find it on Amazon. Very pleased! Review Title: Great find! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Magnetic Eyelashes and Magnetic Eyeliner Kit, Magnetic Eyelashes with Eyeliner, 5 Pairs Reusable Magnetic Eyelashes with Tweezer, False Lashes Review Date: 2020/06/29 Store: Eyenjoy Average Rating: 3.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Eyenjoy', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.71 x 5.39 x 0.71 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Magnet', 'Product Dimensions': '5.71 x 5.39 x 0.71 inches; 2.12 Ounces', 'UPC': '736067423758'} Review Text: Let me start by saying that these are the easiest eyelashes that I have ever used. I was definitely skeptical but it really is as easy as swiping on the magnetic liner and then sticking the lash strip in place. THAT IS IT! No fussing, no dropping, no glue, no 2-piece magnet that you can't ever position properly. Just swipe and stick. Pretty much foolproof! I did find them to be a tad heavy on my eyelid but I imagine that is because I'm not used to wearing false lashes (because I could never figure how to get them on properly...haha) and I'm hoping it will get better with time.

Ok...now onto the negative. While these lashes are absolutely amazing, I was appalled to receive a used tube of eyeliner in my pack. You know the black thread rings that mascara tubes develop after you have removed and inserted the wand a hundred times? That's exactly what the eyeliner tube looked like. A 'sealed' package that contained a used product? Not really sure how that happened. Luckily, the kit contains 2 tubes of eyeliner so I went against my better judgement and decided to try the tube that was obviously (maybe I should say hopefully) not used.

Other than receiving a partially used product, these eyelashes are AMAZING. So easy and fun, I highly recommend!! Review Title: SO easy to apply! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Dr. Denese SkinScience Essential Lipid Anti Aging Power Infusion Dry Oil - Skin Nutrients 97% Organic 100% Natural - Rejuvinating Blend with Amaranth & Resveratrol - Paraben-Free, Cruelty-Free - 2oz Review Date: 2020/08/27 Store: Dr. Denese Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Dr. Denese', 'Item Form': 'Dr. Denese', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.57 x 3.15 x 3.07 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': '800166A', 'UPC': '811684022284', 'Manufacturer': 'Dr. Denese'} Review Text: I was a bit shocked at how greasy this serum is the first time I used it. I expected it to absorb a little better and not stay so "shiny". That being said, it has not caused my skin to break out or look any oilier throughout the day. I use it in the evenings after washing my face and before my moisturizer. A little goes a looong way so this small bottle will last a really long time.

I have only been using it for a little over a week but my skin already looks better. Definitely more hydrated and smooth. This is a great addition to my skincare routine, I highly recommend. Review Title: Hydrating serum Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Karuna Oh, Glow On Face Mask Sheet, Skincare and Beauty Facial Masks with Moisturizing and Collagen Promotion Properties for Healthy Glow, Contain Green Tea, Vitamin C and Pineapple (3 Sheets) Review Date: 2020/09/12 Store: Karuna Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Karuna', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrate Skin,Hydrate', 'Scent': 'Pineapple', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Package Dimensions': '6.54 x 4.88 x 0.87 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MSF1004 - CA', 'UPC': '857950007166'} Review Text: This mask feels really awesome! It is easy to use and left my skin feeling very moisturized. Great for a little pampering every week. My only issue is the price; $6+ per treatment seems a little high to me but that's just my opinion. Overall, it's a great product. Review Title: Moisturizing and easy to use Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Pumpkin Enzyme Mask, Skin Exfoliating, Glycolic Acid, Skin brightening face mask, Vitamin C, Fruit Enzymes, Fine lines and dullness, 4 ounces Review Date: 2020/10/13 Store: CA-PIÈR YOUNG. COMPLEX SKIN. SIMPLE SOLUTION. Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'CA-PIÈR YOUNG. COMPLEX SKIN. SIMPLE SOLUTION.', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating,Skin Brightening', 'Scent': 'Pumpkin', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Item Weight': '4 Ounces'} Review Text: This pumpkin mask looks like something I whipped right up in my kitchen. It smells like fresh pumpkin and appears incredibly fresh. The directions stated that it's not for sensitive skin so I was a little nervous to use but it was not an issue. I had a slight bit of redness but it went away after just a few minutes. Overall, my skin looked fresh and brighter than before. As a weekly treatment this jar will last a good while so the price is not awful for the value. I would definitely purchase again. Review Title: Brightens skin Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Hair Extensions Clip in Human Hair 7 pcs 120g Clip in Hair Extensions for Women Ombre Hair Extensions Human Hair 16 inch(#16/22) Review Date: 2021/04/22 Store: PLADIO Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'PLADIO', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '16 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '7.83 x 4.84 x 1.57 inches; 7.83 Ounces'} Review Text: This is my first experience with extensions and I have been SO impressed. First, the highlighted blonde matches my hair 100%. I know this won't be the case for everyone but I was shocked at how close it was to my "natural" color. They arrived neatly packaged and it was really easy to seperate and keep them tangle free. The clips are also a great feature as they pop in and out with ease. I was easily able to work them in without the clips showing through my hair. I washed and air dried each piece after wearing and they was so easy to restyle. The price is a bit steep but considerably less than what I would expect to pay for good quality.
If you're a newbie and considering highlights, these are definitely a great place to start. I highly recommend!! Review Title: So natural and easy to use! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Preferences and Shopping Patterns:**

1. **Beauty and Personal Care:** Frequent purchases of hair and skin care products indicate a strong preference for beauty enhancements. Items vary from straighteners, hair extensions, to skincare masks.

2. **Quality Over Quantity:** Reviews reflect a tendency to favor products that provide effective results (e.g., moisturization and skin brightening) over those that may look good but underperform (e.g., ineffectiveness of the straightener).

3. **Ease of Use:** Preference for user-friendly products is evident. Positive feedback on magnetic eyelashes highlights the importance of simplicity in application.

4. **Value and Hydration:** Favorable reviews for moisturizing products show a clear value placed on skin hydration and overall health. The user appreciates products that deliver visible results without excessive cost.

5. **Design Appeal:** Visual aesthetics play a role in purchase decisions, as noted in the attraction to items that are not only functional but also attractive (e.g., rose-gold straightener).

6. **Effective Features:** Features such as temperature control in styling tools and moisturizing capabilities in sanitizers correlate with positive purchasing experiences.

7. **Product Variety:** Engagement with a diverse product range—from hair tools to skincare masks—suggests openness to exploring various beauty solutions.

Overall, the shopper displays a deliberate and thoughtful approach to beauty, balancing aesthetics with effectiveness and convenience.

target_interaction.title: Smells great, doesn't linger
target_interaction.text: This linen spray smells fresh and clean without being too overwhelming. I did deduct one star because it doesn't last long at all but it does smell nice for a short time. Currently, there is no retail price listed for me to compare value but I would definitely consider purchasing again.  It would also make a nice gift, perhaps as an addition to a gift basket or housewarming.
target_interaction.title_meta: Florona Hibiscus Air Freshener Room Spray for Deep Sleep 100 ml - Pure & Unrefined Pillow Mist & Linen Spray (Hibiscus,100 ml)
